# üåÖ Daybreak AI Development

> [!project] **AI Platform and Services Development**
> Building a comprehensive AI platform for intelligent automation and decision-making

---

## üéØ Project Overview

### Objective
Develop a comprehensive AI platform that provides intelligent automation, decision-making capabilities, and AI-powered services for businesses and organizations.

### Business Value
- **Automation** - Automate complex business processes and workflows
- **Intelligence** - Provide AI-powered insights and decision support
- **Scalability** - Scale AI capabilities across multiple use cases
- **Innovation** - Drive innovation through AI-powered solutions

---

## üî• Key Deliverables

### Phase 1: Core Platform (Weeks 1-6) ‚úÖ
- [x] **AI Engine** - Core AI processing engine and framework
- [x] **API Gateway** - RESTful API for AI services
- [x] **Data Pipeline** - Data ingestion and processing pipeline
- [x] **Model Management** - AI model lifecycle management

### **Call Quality Scoring Feature** (Deployed 2025-09-19) ‚úÖ
- [x] **Objective Scoring System** - AI-powered call evaluation system
- [x] **Transcript Analysis** - Automatic call transcription and analysis
- [x] **Quality Metrics** - Comprehensive scoring parameters
- [x] **Admin Interface** - User-friendly scoring and management interface

### Phase 2: AI Services (Weeks 7-12)
- [ ] **Natural Language Processing** - NLP services and capabilities
- [ ] **Computer Vision** - Image and video processing services
- [ ] **Predictive Analytics** - Predictive modeling and analytics
- [ ] **Automation Engine** - Workflow automation and orchestration

### Phase 3: Advanced Features (Weeks 13-18)
- [ ] **Real-time Processing** - Real-time AI processing capabilities
- [ ] **Multi-tenant Architecture** - Multi-tenant platform architecture
- [ ] **Integration Hub** - Third-party service integrations
- [ ] **Analytics Dashboard** - AI performance and usage analytics

---

## üõ†Ô∏è Technical Stack

### Core Technologies
- **Python** - Primary development language
- **FastAPI** - Modern web framework for APIs
- **TensorFlow/PyTorch** - Machine learning frameworks
- **Redis** - Caching and session management

### AI/ML Technologies
- **OpenAI API** - GPT models and embeddings
- **Anthropic Claude** - Advanced language models
- **Hugging Face** - Pre-trained models and transformers
- **MLflow** - ML lifecycle management

### Infrastructure
- **AWS** - Cloud platform and services
- **Docker** - Containerization
- **Kubernetes** - Container orchestration
- **PostgreSQL** - Database for platform data

---

## üéØ Next Actions

### **Current Sprint** (Week of Sep 24, 2025)
- [ ] **Fix Versions Bug** - Resolve version information display issue (48-hour target)
- [ ] **Auto-scoring Fix** - Fix background job trigger for automatic scoring on upload
- [ ] **Title Fallback** - Add fallback logic for missing call title metadata
- [ ] **Fix Speaker Attribution** - Correct Caller/Agent labels for Jeff's recording (first one on list)
- [ ] **Re-score Fixed Recording** - Update scoring after correcting speaker attribution
- [ ] **Post Updated Result** - Share corrected scoring result with Jeff and Kristen
- [ ] **Check Other Recordings** - Look for similar speaker attribution issues across all recordings
- [ ] **CSR List Import** - Import team CSR list for dropdown functionality
- [ ] **Hold Detection** - Design and implement hold detection in transcripts
- [ ] **Feedback Loop** - Implement agree/disagree mechanism for AI scoring validation

### **Next Week**
- [ ] **User Training** - Conduct backend training session with Kristen Cillo
- [ ] **Staff Onboarding** - Enable staff to use system for message creation
- [ ] **Performance Optimization** - Optimize scoring system based on user feedback
- [ ] **Feature Enhancement** - Implement additional scoring parameters and metrics

---

## üìä Current Status (as of 2025-09-24)

### **Call Quality Scoring Feature**
- **Deployment**: Successfully deployed to QA and PROD (Sep 19, 2025)
- **User Feedback**: Positive response from Jeff Mehl ("This looks amazing!!")
- **Active Testing**: Kristen Cillo providing detailed feedback and testing

### **Issues Identified & Resolved**
- **Versions Bug**: ‚úÖ FIXED - Version information now displaying correctly in admin panel
- **Auto-scoring**: ‚úÖ FIXED - Background job trigger now firing on upload
- **Call Titles**: ‚úÖ FIXED - Added filename + date fallback for missing metadata
- **Speaker Attribution**: ‚úÖ FIXED - Caller/Agent labels corrected for accurate scoring
- **CSR List**: üöß WORKING ON - Need team list import for dropdown functionality
- **Hold Detection**: üöß WORKING ON - Feature request for detecting holds during calls
- **Feedback Loop**: üöß WORKING ON - Need agree/disagree mechanism for AI scoring validation

### **Major Milestone Achieved** (Sep 26, 2025)
- **All Critical Bugs Fixed**: ‚úÖ Versions, Auto-scoring, Title Fallback, Speaker Attribution
- **Deployment Success**: ‚úÖ All fixes deployed to QA and Prod
- **Team Satisfaction**: ‚úÖ Positive feedback from both Kristen and Jeff
- **System Fully Functional**: ‚úÖ Call Quality Scoring system working perfectly

### **Next Sprint Actions** (Week of Sep 30, 2025)
- **CSR List Import**: Pull team list from database
- **Hold Detection**: Design complex hold calculation logic
- **Feedback Loop**: Implement agree/disagree mechanism
- **Automated Integration**: Plan AWS integration approach
